title: Taliyah speculations.
body: I think that Taliyah will be a support champion, due to her innocence/unwillingness to kill another being. According to her lore, Taliyah is encountered by Yasuo after running away from the carnage left behind whilst fighting along side Noxus against Ionia, and Yasuo takes her under his "wing" (Haha get it, because she's a bird, get it? Ok.) and tries to guide Taliyah as to how to control and unlock her power. So due to her aquintence with Yasuo I obviously suspect they will have great synergy (Yay!), but I also think that Taliyah will be the first support to enable a melee adc to botlane, and be a viable pick. Another reason I suspect this is because Riot has stated they would like botlane to support a wider variety of adc's not specific to just marksmen. These are just my speculations, I would love to hear your thoughts, lore related theories, speculations, and guesses on what Taliyah as a champion will be like!

An immobile champion that primarily uses their spells (not AA's) to keep their enemy at bay and burst down their health.

Examples would be:

{{champion:63}} 
{{champion:90}} 
{{champion:161}}
